channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Pluribus' The Joining explained: what is it, why is Carol [spoiler], and more on the Apple TV show's big mystery
item.description: Apple's new sci-fi drama has already lifted the veil on its first big mystery.

item.title: Apple’s latest sci-fi series Pluribus luxuriates in its mystery
item.description: Toward the end of the first episode of Pluribus, Carol (Rhea Seehorn), a woman put in a bizarre and impossible scenario, asks a very straightforward question: "What the fuck is happening?" It's something you'll likely be asking yourself a lot while watching. I certainly did. But that ongoing sense of mystery, and the measured pace […]

item.title: Pluribus review: I cant tell you much about Vince Gilligans sci-fi series, but what I can say is glowing
item.description: Vince Gilligan's "Pluribus," starring Rhea Seehorn, is shrouded in secrecy. Here's one thing that isn't a secret: It rocks.

item.title: The best AirPods to buy
item.description: Whether you’re buying your first pair of AirPods or replacing a well-used older pair, it’s easy to understand why so many iPhone owners prefer Apple’s earbuds and headphones over other options. Apple has spent years gradually adding new features that work best — and sometimes only work at all — with the company’s own devices. […]
